review_data.title: Perfect fusion between Sri Lankan&Indian food!
review_data.content: Perfect atmosphere, very good service and excellent food. A very worthy place to come back and try other specialities.

review_data.title: Das Essen war hervorragend und auch grosszügig von der Portion her
review_data.content: Wir waren sehr begeistert von der freundlichen Bedienung und auch eine gut ausgewogene Speisekarte und immer frische Zutaten (Kotthu Roti,...More

review_data.title: New Avatar
review_data.content: Essen war super 🤩. Freundliche Bedingungen Sehr gute 👍🏾 Service. Mann kann wider Besuchen. Sehr feine Essen

review_data.title: Indian food like you get in England!!
review_data.content: I've tried various Indian restaurants in Zürich but have never really found one that I wanted to go back to until now. New Avataar serves great Indian and Sri Lankan food in a small restaurant a few minutes walk from Bahnhof Wipkingen. The decor is...More

review_data.title: Little Home Style Gem
review_data.content: If you want good food, this is THE place to be :) Delicious food and friendly service. We will be back again and again.

review_data.title: Laut Angaben im Internet sollte

review_data.title: Top Inder - nicht von der Webseite irritieren lassen
